title: Dr. Crystal Carter - Internal Medicine, Dallas TX
description: Detailed profile of Crystal Carter, an Internal Medicine specialist in Dallas TX, providing phone numbers, practice locations, specialties and more
cleaned_text: Crystal Carter Dr. Crystal Carter is an Internal Medicine Specialist in Dallas, Texas. She graduated with honors from Lincoln Mem Univ, Debusk Col Of Osteopathic Med in 2015. Having more than 8 years of diverse experiences, especially in INTERNAL MEDICINE, Dr. Crystal Carter affiliates with Methodist Charlton Medical Center, cooperates with many other doctors and specialists in medical group Medhealth. Call Dr. Crystal Carter on phone number [(972) 780-8400](tel:9727808400) for more information and advice or to book an appointment. [See other contact addresses](#secondary_locations) does not own any un-incorporated business by herself.| |Accepts Medicare Assignment||She does accept the payment amount Medicare approves and not to bill you for more than the Medicare deductible and coinsurance.| Medical Specialities - INTERNAL MEDICINE Credentials - Doctor of Osteopathic Medicine (DO) Education & Training - Dr. Crystal Carter attended to Lincoln Mem Univ, Debusk Col Of Osteopathic Med and then graduated in 2015 NPPES Information - NPI #: 1093109704 - Enumeration Date: Mar 20th, 2015 - Last Update Date: Jan 17th, 2023 [Request for update](javascript:void(0)) Medical Licenses Dr. Crystal Carter has primarily specialised in Internal Medicine for over 8 years. |Specialization||License Number||Issued State| |Allopathic & Osteopathic Physicians Medicine||T7882||Texas| Affiliated Hospitals Name||Hospital Type||Hospital Ownership||Location| | | Medical Group Practices |Organization||Members| | | Practice Locations Primary Practice Location Dallas, Texas [Map and Directions](//maps.google.com/maps?f=d&hl=en&geocode=&&daddr=7979+W+Virginia+Dr%2C+Dallas%2C+TX+75237-3798&ie=UTF8&z=16) Monday - Friday: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM - Saturday - Sunday: Closed Secondary Practice Locations Cleveland, Ohio (216) 851-4125 This doctor profile was extracted from the dataset publicized on Aug 31st, 2023 by the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) and from the corresponded NPI record updated on Jan 17th, 2023 on NPPES website.
